item.title: 谷歌發佈 2023 年度搜索趨勢
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，谷歌發佈了 2023 年搜索服務趨勢年度展望。以下是 2023 年全球 Google 用户的熱門搜索趨勢：

  5. Hurricane Idalia
  6. Hurricane Lee
  7. Maine shooting
  8. Nashville shooting
  9. Chandrayaan-3
  10. War in Sudan

item.title: Arc 瀏覽器 Windows 版試用邀請開啓
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，位於紐約的初創公司 The Browser Company 宣佈，基於 Chromium 的瀏覽器 Arc Browser 已開始向 Windows 用户發送 Beta 版試用邀請，未來幾周內將邀請數百名 beta 測試用户加入 Arc 瀏覽器。現在讀者仍可從其官網加入 Waitlist。此前該瀏覽器已率先開放了 Mac 和 iOS 版本的下載。與常規瀏覽器不同，Arc 瀏覽器將 URL 地址欄放在了左側。Arc 不支持 cookie，並承諾不與他人共享搜索數據。開發人員使用了 Apple 的 Swift 編程語言開發了 Windows 版本。

The Browser Company, a startup based in New York, announced that its Chromium-based browser Arc Browser has started sending beta trial invitations to Windows users and will invite hundreds of beta testers to join Arc Browser in the coming weeks. Readers can still join the Waitlist on their official website. Previously, this browser had already released downloads for Mac and iOS versions. Unlike regular browsers, Arc Browser places the URL address bar on the left side. Arc does not support cookies and promises not to share search data with others. The developers used Apple’s Swift programming language to develop the Windows version.

item.title: 微軟首席執行官：Copilot 好比 Windows 的「開始」菜單
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，微軟再次表達了對其人工智能助理 Copilot 的重視。微軟首席執行官薩蒂亞·納德拉（Satya Nadella）近日在 2023 年驍龍峯會的舞台演講中表示，Copilot 類似於 Windows 操作系統的 「開始」 按鈕。

Copilot 類似於 「開始」 按鈕。它成為了你所有應用體驗的指揮者。所以舉個例子，我只需前往那裏並表達我的意圖，它要麼將我導航到一個應用程序，要麼將應用程序帶到 Copilot 上來，因此它幫助我學習、查詢和創建——而且完全改變了用户的習慣，我認為。

微軟將在 2024 年發佈下一代 Windows 操作系統，據説它將帶來 「突破性」 的人工智能功能。該系統的主要特性已在最近曝光。

Microsoft has once again expressed its importance to its artificial intelligence assistant Copilot. Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella recently stated in his keynote speech at the 2023 Snapdragon Summit that Copilot is similar to the 「Start」 button of the Windows operating system.

Copilot is similar to the 「Start」 button. It becomes the conductor of all your application experiences. So, for example, I just need to go there and express my intention, it will either navigate me to an application or bring the application onto Copilot, so it helps me learn, query, and create – and completely changes users’ habits, I think.

Microsoft will release the next generation of Windows operating system in 2024, which is said to bring 「breakthrough」 artificial intelligence features. The main features of this system have recently been exposed.

item.title: 發佈三天後，iMessage 第三方客户端 Beeper Mini 停止工作
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，適用於 Android 的 iMessage 客户端 Beeper Mini 在發佈後三天後停止工作。許多用户反饋説，週五以來，無法再通過 Beeper Mini 發送和接收 iMessage 消息。Beeper 的首席執行官懷疑蘋果公司與此有關，因為 「所有數據都指向」 蘋果公司。他説：「如果確實是蘋果公司，那麼更大的問題是，如果蘋果真的關心 iPhone 用户的隱私和安全，為什麼要試圖切斷一項可以向 Android 用户發送加密聊天的服務？」 他認為，這樣做會強迫蘋果用户像以前一樣發送非加密的短信到 Android 設備。Beeper 同時在 X（Twitter）上表示，修復方案 「即將」 到來。

Beeper Mini, an iMessage client for Android, has stopped working three days after its release. Many users have reported that they are unable to send and receive iMessage messages through Beeper Mini since Friday. The CEO of Beeper suspects that Apple is involved, as 「all the data points to」 Apple. He stated, 「If it is indeed Apple, the bigger question is, if Apple truly cares about the privacy and security of its iPhone users, why would they try to cut off a service that allows encrypted messaging to Android users?」 He believes that this would force Apple users to send unencrypted text messages to Android devices as they did before. Beeper also mentioned on Twitter that a fix is 「coming soon.」

item.title: 傳 FTC 正調查微軟與 OpenAI 的合作關係
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，匿名消息人士説，美國聯邦貿易委員會（FTC）正在調查微軟和 OpenAI 兩家公司之間的金融合作夥伴關係，以及它是否可能違反該國的反壟斷法。目前 FTC 的審查是初步的，正式調查尚未開始。無獨有偶，英國競爭和市場管理局（CMA）稱，將聽取公司和第三方的意見，然後可能對微軟-OpenAI 的合作伙伴關係展開調查。該機構想了解微軟與 OpenAI 的交易是否影響了該國人工智能領域的競爭。微軟對 CMA 的調查迴應，其與 OpenAI 的關係在人工智能領域引發了競爭，同時保持了兩家公司的獨立性。截至目前，微軟已向 OpenAI 投資了數十億美元，並剛剛在 OpenAI 董事會獲得了一個觀察員席位（沒有投票權）。

Anonymous sources say that the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) in the United States is investigating the financial partnership between Microsoft and OpenAI, as well as whether it may violate the country’s antitrust laws. The FTC’s review is currently preliminary, and a formal investigation has not yet begun.Coincidentally, the Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) in the United Kingdom stated that it will seek opinions from companies and third parties before potentially launching an investigation into the partnership between Microsoft and OpenAI. The agency wants to understand if Microsoft’s transaction with OpenAI has affected competition in the field of artificial intelligence in their country. In response, Microsoft stated that its relationship with OpenAI has sparked competition in the field of artificial intelligence while maintaining both companies’ independence.As of now, Microsoft has invested billions of dollars into OpenAI and recently obtained an observer seat on OpenAI’s board (without voting rights).
